MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ContentLockedUri As Uri
public: static property Android::Net::Uri ^ ContentLockedUri { Android::Net::Uri ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: The content:// style URL for locked messages in this table.

remarks.para: The content:// style URL for locked messages in this table.
This Uri is used to check at most one locked message found in the union of MMS and SMS messages. Also this will return only _id column in response.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SearchUri As Uri
public: static property Android::Net::Uri ^ SearchUri { Android::Net::Uri ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Pass in a query parameter called "pattern" which is the text to search for.

remarks.para: Pass in a query parameter called "pattern" which is the text to search for. The sort order is fixed to be: thread_id ASC, date DESC.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
